metadata.title: RX Family: Has the data flash correctly erased according to the procedure?

sections.content:
Question:
Has the data flash correctly erased according to the procedure?
Answer:
After a data flash area has been erased, the value cannot be read correctly. If read, the value is undefined. Please use the blank check command to check whether the data flash has been correctly erased (blanked).
  Suitable Products
RX210
RX21A
RX220
RX26T
RX600 Series
RX700 Series
